skill.03_drk.ws_0.name: Hard Slash
skill.03_drk.ws_1.name: Syphon Strike
skill.03_drk.ws_2.name: Souleater
skill.03_drk.ws_3.name: Shadowbringer
skill.03_drk.ws_c.lore.0: Deals damage to the nearest enemy.
skill.03_drk.ws_0.lore.1: After damage calculation, restore your own health.
skill.03_drk.ws_1.lore.1: After damage calculation, grants Haste to self.
skill.03_drk.ws_2.lore.1: After damage calculation, grants self a regeneration effect and creates a barrier equal to one health gauge.
skill.03_drk.ws_3.lore.0: Performs a straight-line area attack toward the target.
skill.03_drk.ws_3.lore.1: After damage calculation, the LIMIT BREAK gauge continues to accumulate for a set period of time.
skill.03_drk.ab_0.name: The Blackest Night
skill.03_drk.ab_0.lore.0: Deploys a barrier that absorbs damage and
skill.03_drk.ab_0.lore.1: reflexively deals damage to surrounding enemies upon being hit.
skill.03_drk.lb.name: Eventide
skill.03_drk.lb.lore.0: At the cost of Wither oneself, performs a linear area attack in front and behind.
skill.03_drk.lb.lore.1: After damage calculation, the common penalty effect of LIMIT BREAK is applied.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_0.name: Rapid Blade
skill.ex1_exc.ws_0.lore.0: Charge toward the nearest enemy, dealing damage to the target and surrounding enemies.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_0.lore.1: After damage is dealt, return to your original position after a set duration.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_1.name: Snow White Steels
skill.ex1_exc.ws_1.lore.0: Deals damage to enemies around you with an area attack.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_1.lore.1: After use, the user gains resistance.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_2.name: Fullmoon Steels
skill.ex1_exc.ws_2.lore.0: Deals damage to enemies around you with an area attack.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_2.lore.1: After use, the user gains speed.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_3.name: Flurry Blossoms Steels
skill.ex1_exc.ws_3.lore.0: Deals damage to enemies around you with an area attack.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_3.lore.1: After use, deploys a barrier that absorbs damage.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_4.name: Overproduction Steel
skill.ex1_exc.ws_4.lore.0: Deals massive damage to the nearest enemy.
skill.ex1_exc.ws_4.lore.1: Additionally, inflicts a Wither effect on the target for a set duration.
skill.ex1_exc.ab_0.name: Vampiric Blade
skill.ex1_exc.ab_0.lore.0: Increases the attack power of normal attacks.
skill.ex1_exc.ab_0.lore.1: Additionally, when a weapon skill hits, it restores a small amount of health.
skill.ex1_exc.lb.name: Semiprime
skill.ex1_exc.lb.lore.0: Envelops oneself in flames, granting various effects.
skill.ex1_exc.lb.lore.1: Upon effect duration ending, incurs the standard LIMIT BREAK penalty effect.

item.dark_knight.boots.name: Dark Knight's Boots

item.raised_soul.chestplate.name: Exorcist's Robe
item.raised_soul.leggings.name: Exorcist's Hakama
item.raised_soul.boots.name: Exorcist's Sash
item.raised_soul.rhweapon.name: Divine Firelinkers' Righthand Blade
item.raised_soul.lhweapon.name: Divine Firelinkers' Leftthand Blade
skill.common.atk_bonus.info: This ability is subject to the attack power modifier applied to normal attacks.
